Name: ACM Digital Library
Full search Query: Abstract:(("choice" OR "decision analysis" OR "decision making" OR "decision-making" OR "idea screening" OR "information gathering" OR "judgement" OR "judgment" OR "option analysis" OR "trade-off") AND ("information system analysis" OR "information system design" OR "information system development" OR "information system planning" OR "information system requirements" OR "new product" OR "product design" OR "product development" OR "software architecture" OR "software design" OR "software development" OR "software planning" OR "software requirements") AND ("analytic" OR "associative" OR "automatic" OR "*conscious*" OR "dual-process*" OR "experiential" OR "explicit" OR "gut-feel*" OR "heuristic" OR "holistic" OR "implicit" OR "intuit*" OR "naturalistic" OR "*rational*" OR "reasoning" OR "reflect*" OR "reflex*" OR "system 1" OR "system 2" OR "tacit"))
